events.message: The customer reported an auto accident involving a rear-end collision that occurred yesterday during rush hour.
The claim has been accurately categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial incident details provided.
An agent specializing in auto claims was assigned to manage this case and ensure proper follow-up.
Confirmation sent to the claimant acknowledging receipt of the accident claim and outlining next steps.
Request for accident report, vehicle inspection photos, and driverâ€™s license copies has been sent to the claimant.
Customer submitted the required accident report, photos, and insurance documents promptly for review.
Investigation into the circumstances of the vehicle collision has been initiated by the claims department.
Investigation completed with findings confirming the claim details and fault assessment of the accident.
A settlement offer covering vehicle repair costs and rental reimbursement has been formally proposed to the customer.
The claimant provided positive feedback regarding the clarity of the settlement proposal and communication.
Our claim approval has been processed effectively, enabling the release of funds for vehicle repairs.
The payment covering the approved settlement amount was successfully issued and transferred to the customer account.
Following final confirmation of payment receipt, the auto accident claim case has been officially closed.
The claim files and all associated documentation have been securely archived for future reference.
